original_text: Christ himself always did what was right. But he received pain on behalf of people who do what is wrong. He died once to take away all those wrong things. He did that to bring you near to God. People killed Christ's body, but God's Spirit made him alive again. Christ himself always did what was right. But he received pain on behalf of people who do what is wrong. He died once to take away all those wrong things. He did that to bring you near to God. People killed Christ's body, but God's Spirit made him alive again.
korean_text: 그리스도께서도 단번에 죄를 위하여 죽으사 의인으로서 불의한 자를 대신하셨으니 이는 우리를 하나님 앞으로 인도하려 하심이라 육체로는 죽임을 당하시고 영으로는 살리심을 받으셨으니

sentences.original_text: Christ himself always did what was right.
But he received pain on behalf of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 사람들을 위해 고통을 받았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He died once to take away all those wrong things.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모든 잘못된 것들을 없애기 위해 한 번 죽으셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did that to bring you near to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 당신을 하나님께 가까이 오게 하기 위해 그렇게 했습니다.
